metadata.title: CVE-2016-9934 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
ext/wddx/wddx.c in PHP before 5.6.28 and 7.x before 7.0.13 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) viacrafted serialized data in a wddxPacket XML document, as demonstrated by aPDORow string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9934` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php5 - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
libapache2-mod-php5filter - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
libphp5-embed - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php-pear - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5 - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-cgi - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-cli - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-common - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-curl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-enchant - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-fpm - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-gd - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-gmp - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-intl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-ldap - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-mysql - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-mysqlnd - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-odbc - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-pgsql - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-pspell - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-readline - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-recode - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-snmp - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-sqlite - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-sybase - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-tidy - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-xmlrpc - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
php5-xsl - 5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.9+dfsg-1ubuntu4.21').
